text1: Precision-engineered machines and tools used in light manufacturing and assembly. Essential for producing consumer goods and smaller-scale industrial components.
Bulk structural parts and frames used in heavy assemblies and substructures.

High-precision machined parts made from rare metals, essential for advanced systems and precision-heavy assemblies. Used in the manufacture of components for machinery, electronics, and specialized equipment requiring exact tolerances and durability.
Pre-assembled modules combining light and precision components. Ready for final assembly.
Light, labor-intensive components used in consumer goods and light industrial products. Forms the backbone of everyday manufacturing and assembly.
